name: Police Tuk Tuk: Auto Rickshaw Driving Simulator
name_original: Police Tuk Tuk: Auto Rickshaw Driving Simulator
description:
Chase the bad guys - but not in a squad car. Make do with tuk tuk auto rickshaw this time around. Anything to stop crime, right?

Report to the incident, locate the bad guys, chase them and wipe them off the face of the earth!
